Pre-Game Insights: The Pirates are 33-60 in games when they have allowed at least one home run.
The Royals have the sixth-ranked team ERA in the AL at 3.87.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the second time these teams square off this season.
Bryan Reynolds leads the Pirates with a.281 batting average, and has 28 doubles, three triples, 22 home runs, 51 walks and 84 RBI.
Bobby Witt Jr. leads the Royals with a.332 batting average, and has 42 doubles, 11 triples, 30 home runs, 47 walks and 99 RBI.
Others: The Pirates are 70-77 overall and 37-39 in home games.
The Royals have an 81-67 record overall and a 36-37 record on the road.
